A **completely free**, **AI-powered** API testing tool - the modern open-source alternative to Postman and Apifox.

| Platform | File | Architecture |

- HTTP API Testing (RESTful)
- WebSocket Testing

### ğŸ³ Self-Hosted Deployment

Deploy with Docker:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/trueleaf/apiflow.git
cd apiflow
docker compose up -d
```

Visit http://localhost to access your self-hosted instance.
